2. Exact file paths and complete code examples for each component
3. Terraform configurations for all GCP services (Cloud Run, Cloud SQL, Pub/Sub, Storage, etc.)
4. Database schema SQL with Alembic migrations
5. FastAPI boilerplate for API Gateway and all 6 worker services
6. Docker configurations for each service
7. GitHub Actions CI/CD workflows
8. React frontend structure with Firebase Auth integration
9. Step-by-step deployment commands (gcloud, terraform, docker)
10. Environment configuration templates
11. Testing strategies for each phase
12. Troubleshooting guides for common issues

The plan should have bite-sized tasks that can be completed in 2-4 hours each, with clear dependencies and verification steps. Include all necessary commands, configuration files, and code snippets so another AI or developer can execute the plan without needing to make architectural decisions.)
